title: Bringing-Forth vs Challenging-Forth: Attitudes towards technology ...
body: Challenging-Forth is the opposite of Bringing-Forth, it is the most prevalent attitude towards technology today, and it is the improper one. With this attitude, Subjects do not have essence they are merely viewed as material. When they look at a forest, they don't necessarily see trees, they see lumber. Everywhere they look in nature they only ...
